roleset.name: to compliment upon a happy event
roleset.note: FELICITATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'felicitate' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 33. (from felicitate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Mr. Azad was addressing a mammoth public gathering at Dumhall, Anantnag today, organized *PRO* to felicitate the Central Minister on his induction into the Union Cabinet.
example.arg: on his induction into the Union Cabinet.
